ipxact:busDefinition.ipxact:name: wishbone
ipxact:busDefinition.ipxact:description:
Specification of wishbone bus is available at: http://cdn.opencores.org/downloads/wbspec_b4.pdf
Clock and reset signals are not specifically master-to-slave signals nor vice versa, but instead they come from a third party that assumes neither mode.
Notice that while multiple slaves and masters are supported, broadcasts are not. Thus an arbiter will be required, unless it is a single master to single slave connection.
